PhonebookFaculty Staff Students As PDF University Directory Search People Overview Name Search by name Title Search by title Location Search by location Apply Reset Can Firtina Assistant Professor Email: firtinaumd[.dot.]edu Location: IRB 3236 Website: https://canfirtina.com/ Google Scholar: KvB1G5EAAAAJ Twitter: FirtinaC Education: PhD, ETH Zurich, 2025 Appointments: CS, CBCB Research Areas: Bioinformatics and Computational Biology, Systems, Networking, and Architecture, Machine Learning and Data Science Biography Can Firtina is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the University of Maryland, College Park (UMD). He obtained his Ph.D. from ETH Zurich, and his M.Sc. and B.Sc. degrees from Bilkent University. His research interests broadly span bioinformatics and computer architecture topics, including real-time, accurate, fast, and energy-efficient genome analysis, hardware-software co-design for accelerating bioinformatics workloads, and developing computational tools for genome editing. His research has been published in major bioinformatics and computer architecture venues. Mentions 2025 Can Firtina Joins Computer Science Faculty With Focus on Bioinformatics and Computer Architecture
